reviewText: I bought this movie as it's a great movie but as advertised, it's available only in region 2.  I bought a multi-region DVD player years ago from Bombay Electronics so I would have no problem ordering DVDs that are not region 1.
Service was EXCELLENT, but I failed to note their warning CD would not work on U.S.A. players.  Otherwise, I'm very sure I would have LOVED IT.  Embarrassed at my own stupidity.
Really good movie but having to order it from Region 2 in the UK - the disc won't play on regular CD players here in the U.S.?  I returned it of course and received a refund.
